public void run()

addDesignerComponent

public void addDesignerComponent(DesignerComponent newComp)
Adds the given DesignerComponent to this ApplicationFrame.

Parameters:
newComp - The DesignerComponent to add.

setLayoutMode

public void setLayoutMode(boolean isLayoutMode)
Sets the ApplicationFrame into Layout Mode based on the given boolean value. Also sets all DesignerComponent objects in this ApplicationFrame to designer mode.

Parameters:
isLayoutMode - If true the ApplicationFrame will be set to Layout Mode. If false, it will be set to Designer Mode.
